gold.user: As a developer, I want to retrieve all dynamic webhooks associated with my app to ensure they are correctly configured and functioning.
gold.ideal: The response should return a list of webhooks with their details, including the URL, events they are subscribed to, and their current status.

gold.user: As a developer, I need to register a new dynamic webhook for my application to receive real-time updates on specific events.
gold.ideal: The response should confirm the successful registration of the webhook and provide the webhook ID and details of the registered events.

gold.user: As an administrator, I want to delete a specific webhook that is no longer needed to keep the system clean and efficient.
gold.ideal: The response should confirm the deletion of the webhook and indicate that it has been successfully removed from the system.

gold.user: As a system operator, I need to check for any failed webhooks to troubleshoot issues and ensure that all events are being processed correctly.
gold.ideal: The response should provide a list of failed webhooks, including the reason for failure and any relevant error messages.

gold.user: As a developer, I want to refresh all webhooks to ensure they are up-to-date with the latest configuration and settings.
gold.ideal: The response should confirm that the webhooks have been refreshed and provide a summary of any changes made during the refresh process.
